website_summaries.verdict: It has some convenient features, but lacks quality compared to others on our list.
pros: Impact bonded base provides precise heating
We love its pour spout and streamlined handle
cons: It's similar to our best of the best pick, but its construction doesn't seem as durable

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was a great pan other than being a bit too skinny and tall. I would have liked it to be a little shorter and wider. I love the pour spouts and the measuring marks. After a few uses, it got two black warped places on the bottom. I have no idea what happened. I have an induction cooktop. Not that expensive but too expensive for very few uses. Oh, I really liked the lid too. Lots of pros but one serious con.
customer_reviews.author: STO1119

customer_reviews.title: was disappointed since the lid was bent and did not close ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son while in Hawaii, it did arrive in time, however, was disappointed since the lid was bent and did not close well, also the stainless steel seemed lighter than the ones I have at home. Will not buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bubble wrap? Where is the box??
customer_reviews.text: I got the 1.5 quart, its sturdy, heavy and doesn't feel or look cheap or flimsy. My only complaint is that this did not come in a box, came wrap in bubble wrap, if Amazon is going to be saving on cardboard there should be an option for us customers to pick on that because i will love it to recive stuff for Me like that but this is a gift and how am I giving this without the box...... not only it looks aweful but they are going to think I got it at a thrift store 😳🙄
customer_reviews.author: Ann Neris

customer_reviews.title: Completed my set
customer_reviews.text: Instead of purchasing a packaged set, I made individual purchases of various Calphalon cookware of what I wanted. This 3 quart saute pan rounded out my 12 piece set with matching brushed stainless with glass tops and tri-clad bottoms. They are perfect for how I use them and very high quality looking. 1st use was sliced potatoes and carrots, a little veg oil and spices. Cooked evenly, no sticking, and clean up was a sinch.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Man

customer_reviews.title: Continue to look for better ones
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1.5Qt as well as 2.5Qt. Returned both without using. These are tall and narrow style. The 2.5qt had a wobble so poor quality control. 1.5qt was just too narrow. The pans were not as heavy as expected for the Calphalon brand. Seems like quality deterioration over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Michiganian

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Pan
customer_reviews.text: I have had two Calphalon pans for 10 years and have loved them. This pan in nothing like them. It is a lighter steel, the rim of the pan has sharp edges and the handle is different and not comfortable to hold. Overall, it looks and feels like a completely different pan. I am going to buy a new set of pans and it will not be Calphalon.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Borden

customer_reviews.title: too bad
customer_reviews.text: I like this item but I wanted one with a straight tubed handle, like it looked like in the misleading picture.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Faith Ulven

customer_reviews.title: Was the only one missing from the prepacked set so I got this one a la carte
customer_reviews.text: Great pot, great value. I love these. I already had the 1 1/2 qt. and the 2 1/2 qt. that came as part of a prepackaged set but I wanted to have this 3 1/2 quart one as well since I am used to having this size since I had all three of those sizes with my old pots. I love these Calphalon pots. They are a wonderful value, thought was put into the updated design choices and they are great to use!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Saucepan With Very Useful Features
customer_reviews.text: This very convenient Sauce Pan has Volume markings inside for Cups and Fluid Ounces, and also comes with Pour Spouts. The lid has 2 different sizes of drain holes. Made out of High Quality Stainless Steel as expected from Calphalon, and it is easy to clean. It can be used on Gas and Induction and everything in between. Amazing Deal when found at the Amazon Warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos G. Monzon-Guzman

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: My first reaction was disappointment. The pot is lighter weight than older Calphalom kitchen essentials pots and pans I own. And the diameter is slightly different as well, so the lid from a similar non stick pan I have won’t fit. But, as I’ve used it, the thinner bottom has not caused any issues, and I appreciate the lighter weight.
customer_reviews.author: KernsGibbs

customer_reviews.title: this is the best one in the same price range
customer_reviews.text: I try 3 pots so far. this is the best one in the same price range. not that expensive and build by good material. the things that I like most is that it has measurement inside the pot. it is very convenient for me to control the portion.
customer_reviews.author: JYL

customer_reviews.title: Below standard
customer_reviews.text: I have several Calphalon pots which work well and I enjoy using. Dissappointed with the quality of this one.
customer_reviews.author: schoolbooks

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize how much I’d appreciate the measurement markings inside. I find that super handy. I also like the lid strainer on both sides. These “features” come in handy sometimes. Seems like this pan should last a while. I’m happy with the purchase so far. If something changes. I’ll let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for induction cooking
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 14 piece set a couple years back and I noticed I needed a few extra 1.5 qt sauce pans. Ordered one through Amazon and the other two through Penneys. I absolutely love them. Went ahead and got the dutch oven and large steamer/strainer too. (Highly recommend the product.)
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Purr...fect for me
customer_reviews.text: Saute pan a great all purpose pan. This is a down sized version of a larger pan that has become too heavy for my arthritic hands and actually turns put to be the perfect size! Larger pan purchased when a store did not carry this 10" pan. Only found this at Amazon all other sellers sold it as part of a set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong with Calphalon!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace an old non-stick saute pan, and after a lot of research I settled on this one. It's great quality, a good size for 2 people, and I love the stainless steel. And my husband loves that it's dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Unpacking instructions on box.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 3 sause pans. The 1 1/2quart pan came with a strap holding the lid to the pan. I thought that would be how they all were packed. When I pulled the 3 1/2 quart out its box the lid fell to the floor and the glass broke. The box did not indicate that you should have one side up when unpacking
customer_reviews.author: Clyde A. Swasey

customer_reviews.title: Chef husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My chef husband approves & he can be quite particular about these things.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: It's our new mashed potatoes pan. It can take the beating and cleaning hasn't been an issue. The extra depth and glass lid has almost eliminated boil overs. The lid strainer is handy too. I expect to be using this pan for many years.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. leeTop Contributor: Arduino

customer_reviews.title: Prompt shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Product is well constructed. I especially like the two "Lips" for ease of pouring. I have other Calphalon utensils that I have had for years and they have given me great service.
customer_reviews.author: Ervin Kuersten Jr

customer_reviews.title: wonderful pans for normal cooks like me
customer_reviews.text: Got the set without this pan. Now I've got all the pans! I've had the first one I bought for about five years. I love the way they cook. They do NOT stick if you follow Calphalon's directions.
customer_reviews.author: kimberleypea

customer_reviews.title: perfect pan!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. Great size and weight. It also has measurements inside, epouts to pour, and a built in strainer in the lid. Jighly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! I cook stone ground oats for a long ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! I cook stone ground oats for a long time in this pot on regular basis. The oats do not stick and burn but have a great taste. The pot is great for cooking rice as well. I will probably buy another of the same kind but somewhat bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Hazelnut

customer_reviews.title: I love this pan so much I ended up buying a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan so much I ended up buying a second one. It goes in the dishwasher and is the perfect size for cooking something for a single person. It's a nice weight of pan so it holds the heat well and cooks evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Balanced making it easy to pickup even when full. The lid with strainer holes makes convenient strainer for draining liquids away from food. Glass lid so you can see if pot is simmering or boiling as food cooks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gross and used
customer_reviews.text: This pan was super gross and clearly used. It had marks on the bottom and stains on the inside of the pot.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: I use this product quite bit. Love the little slits for draining food. Prefect size for every-day cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Elvijs-Kristians

customer_reviews.title: Love this little sauce pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this little sauce pan. Great when cooking for two. Easily pour soup right from the pan with no drips!
customer_reviews.author: TipofOhio937

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: It is great for cooking but leaves a residue on bottom of the pan. Used vinegar to get it off.
customer_reviews.author: Donald M. Posegate II

customer_reviews.title: Nice pan!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I love the fact that you can strain using the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pot
customer_reviews.text: love it love it, better than the same brand with a non- stick interior coating. Heats up fast. Handle is solid. Convenient size. Cleans easily. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: elaine  shopper

customer_reviews.title: quality is good
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my aluminum one that was same size shape and had the vented lid. It's actually lighter than the aluminum. The handle must be hollow. It seems like really good quality stainless so far. I only used it to boil some eggs.
customer_reviews.author: j weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but I misjudged the size of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, but I misjudged the size of the pot. The 1.5 quart is really small, meaning it can only cook about a 1/2 box of spaghetti effectively (if you break noodles prior you can fit the whole box but i like my noodles as long as possible), I wish i got the 2.5 quart instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kinzo

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best in cooking ware.
customer_reviews.text: Calphalon is the absolute best in cooking ware. Very light weight yet sturdy. Definitely met all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well.
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of the lid doubling as a strainer.
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: I'll miss this pot when I die
customer_reviews.text: This is the best small utility pot I will ever own. Solid build and craftsmanship. I've already burned a few things in it and it doesn't stain. The lid is see through and has a built in strainer. It's even oven-safe! What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Weiss

customer_reviews.title: This item was a needed replacement item and could've easily been returned but since it wasn't non-stick I kept ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd grown tired of returning Cuisinart products and decided to switch to something "American made". This item was a needed replacement item and could've easily been returned but since it wasn't non-stick I kept it. However, before my return time to Amazon ran out, I called Calphalon about some gray (grey) spotting starting to appear on the inside bottom of the pan. I was told this was normal and accepted it as so. Even Barteneders Friends did not remove them and that stuff works!! I like the pot but not the spots. Takes a while to get to a rolling boil on an electric coil top stove but when it does, it' a go.
customer_reviews.author: sja

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!!  SUPERIOR DURABILITY QUALITY WORKMANSHIP!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!!! I love it! I think everyone should have Calphalon in there kitchen. I have 4 pieces but dream of owning more.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Rugged, well made, durable, non toxic pan
customer_reviews.text: Good sized pan for someone who is cooking for only one person
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Best saucepan I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Great heat distribution, great stainless product, lid with strainer so handy, LOVE this sauce pan!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: So far I am not happy about it, 1st time cooking with it and all the food burnt on bottom, followed direction to pre heat on medium and continue to cook on medium heat. I did used olive out and I was shocked to see how much the food burnt
customer_reviews.author: henry

customer_reviews.title: very well made
customer_reviews.text: I really likes these heat up just right they do stay cleaner if you do not put in dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: red011565

customer_reviews.title: Really good stock pot
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good pan, I bought it to replace the same brand and size but it was thinner. It works well for what I bought it for.

customer_reviews.title: Love this cookware
customer_reviews.text: This size was perfect for green beans. I also use it to let the gallon tea bag set in hot water. So easy to pour.

customer_reviews.title: Love love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pot! It's very heavy and thick. It has measurements inside which saves one extra dirty dish. And it has a straining glass lid. Perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Great Pot
customer_reviews.text: great Sauce Pan, shipped fast, exactly as described and expected!

customer_reviews.title: The photograph did not help
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I was not able to see the two easy-to-pour-sides of the Calphalon 2 1/2 Qt. sauce pan that you show on your (online) photograph. ...I.E. the two- easy pour sides do not allow it to fit my stainless steel steamer that I use daily. It requires a 2 1/2 Qt. Calphalon sauce pan without the two e-t-p sides (am looking to replace). The associate vendor was very responsive including the total refund. Amazon and Calphalon are two companies that have served me well.
customer_reviews.author: Nat R.

customer_reviews.title: quality seems ok but the handle is to short for ...
customer_reviews.text: quality seems ok but the handle is to short for my liking and I don't care for the size it's tall and small around lid is a little loose

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable to warm up milk... corrode after first use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this uncoated pan to warm up milk for our little one but it tarnished right away and looks aweful no matter whether we use the dishwasher or do it manually. Even worth I can’t even tell whether or not the coression is unhealthy. Unfortunately we got rid of the box already so we can’t return.

customer_reviews.title: Warps immediately
customer_reviews.text: The inside bottom of pan discolored after first use. Very disappointing!!!! Was beautiful right out of the box!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift given to my daughter and from what I've been told she loves it. So far no complaints.

customer_reviews.title: Nice pan.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy useful pan. It is a good size for everyday cooking.

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love the strainer in the lid as an extra little bit of ingenuity.

customer_reviews.title: The pan I received doesn't seem to distribute heat evenly ...
customer_reviews.text: The pan I received doesn't seem to distribute heat evenly and is a bit difficult to clean. I'll be going back to non-stick pans for sure.

customer_reviews.title: This Pan is solid.
customer_reviews.text: It heats quickly and comes with a lid that easily helps you drain whatever you are cooking.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful

customer_reviews.text: Superior quality and an amazing investment piece for your kitchen!! So happy with this pot!

customer_reviews.text: This made a great gift as it was the perfect size for quick single servings.

customer_reviews.title: A good middle size to small pan
customer_reviews.text: A good middle size to small pan. Easy to clean and the Clear lid lets me see when it is about to boil to prevent boil-overs.

customer_reviews.text: After 2 months light use it has significant surface rust.

customer_reviews.text: The quality is great in all ways and I’m sure they will last for many years.

customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent pan and meets expectations. I am using it heavily for frying and other preparations since a month and have no complaints.

customer_reviews.title: 100 percent satisfied - a very smart design
customer_reviews.text: 100 percent satisfied - a very smart design, perfect size for dishes for 2-4 people, neat cover with perforated edge that minimizes spills and is extremely helpful to drain (pasta, vegetables, etc.), very easy to clean. Works perfect on my induction stove top.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Price was excellent and cheaper that at another discount store
customer_reviews.text: Price was excellent and cheaper that at another discount store. The pan is an excellent replacement for an anodized saute pan I'd for over 10 years. I also like the clear lid (my previous pan had a metal lid).

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Great brand and product. This is a perfect size. Not too big and not too small

customer_reviews.title: had to replace this after it got stolen when I moved
customer_reviews.text: This was one item I was lost without. A few things disappear when you move sometimes. I was unsure what happened but I used this to make small batches of veggies or vegetables to mix in my dog's kibble. I was lost without it for a month and so glad to have it again!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great technology
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. I love the clear top and grooved sides. It let's steam escape while covered. It's the best pot that I've ever used.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The pour spout and filtering lid are great features. The only questionable thing is that there is already a little corrosion happening at the seam where the bottom of the pot meets the body. Time will tell if the corrosion spreads. I guess for the price, it couldn't be perfect. Also if you cook a sauce a long time, the handle will get hot nearer the base.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy pot with lid
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, and versatile, it was a dead ringer for the previous pot and I just love it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new skillet. Easy to clean up & I like that it's dishwasher safe.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking pan
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking pan and works great. Like that the lid has vent holes and measuring marks on the inside. Hefty weight.

customer_reviews.title: B+++, great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's not ALL CLAD, but it's a runner up. I love the size and that it has the drain part. This is a great buy. It looks just like the photo.

customer_reviews.title: Great pot. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great pot . Heats fast on medium heat. Attractive and pours well.love this pot.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The handle gets extremely hot, to where it will give you a burn.

customer_reviews.title: Calphalon Classic Stainless Steel 11/2 Quart Saucepan
customer_reviews.text: Use this saucepan everyday from cooking porridge, rice and pasta. No fuss cooking and easy cleaning afterwards.

customer_reviews.title: Well made/good price
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this item is that it is properly balanced so when you place it on your stove it will not tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Deasy

customer_reviews.title: Scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: The weight of the pan and the see-through lid with steam/pour vents are really great. The only thing that I don't care for is how easily the interior of the pan scratches. I shouldn't have to be limited to using wooden spoons on a stainless pan and I've never had issues with other stainless pans from other manufacturers, so it was surprising how easily this pan marked up. Same issue on the exterior of the pan as well. It cooks great, but I'm more than a little worried about how long it's really going to last if it scratches and marks so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Love this cookware
customer_reviews.text: Love this cookware. I have a 4 quart and this one. Love the built in strainer, the shape and size.

customer_reviews.text: Depth is nice. Hard to clean. Items tend to stick more easily than other stainless pans I have had.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these pans
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these pans. They work perfect on my induction cooktop. I also love the measuring cup inside, as well as the strainer on the lid.

product_meta.title: Calphalon Classic Stainless Steel Cookware, Sauce Pan, 2 1/2-quart
product_meta.description: Size:2.5 QuartImpact-bonded aluminum bases provide fast, even heating. Safe for the stove, oven, broiler, and dishwasher. Long, ergonomic handles provide a secure grip even with full, heavy pans, stay cool even when pan is hot, and are double-riveted by hand. Fill lines make measuring easy, and covers have straining holes that line up with pour spouts to drain liquids without having to use a separate colander. Saucepans with high sides and narrow opening minimize evaporation during slow process of stock- and soup-making. Heavy-gauge sloped bottom heats evenly makes stirring easier. Protected by Calphalon's full 10-year warranty.
feature_bullets: Impact-bonded aluminum bases provide fast, even heating. Safe for the stove, oven, broiler, and dishwasher.
Long, ergonomic handles provide a secure grip even with full, heavy stainless steel saucepans, stay cool even when pan is hot, and are double-riveted by hand.
Fill lines make measuring easy, and covers have straining holes that line up with pour spouts to drain liquids without having to use a separate colander.
High sides and narrow opening minimize evaporation during slow process of stock- and soup-making. Heavy-gauge sloped bottom heats evenly makes stirring easier.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars617 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
